TopicTitle: Is it possible to get an actual navball in real life?

Articles.Content: I kind of want to get a real navball like the one in the game and hook it up to my car (because that would awesome ). I can't seem to find anything about it on google that doesn't just talk about the ones in the game. I'm just wanting something that would always point in the same direction.

If you had $90,000 you could get an Apollo one

https://www.picollecta.com/p/navigation-by-an-8-ball-for-astronauts-brings-90-000-at-heritages-space-auction-1000507797
